name: Collect Iron Ore
description: Mine Iron Ore using the solid drill. To configure the drill, use the middle mouse button. And put it inside a collector. Belts can be drawn around machines with left mouse button

name: Collect Iron Ingot
description: Use the iron ore to make iron ingots using the smelter.

name: Collect Mezholium
description: Mezholium is a local type of rock. You can get it from liquid drills.

name: Collect Copper Plates
description: Use the same procedure as iron for getting Cu ingots, then put them into the manufactury
